title: I doubt they will bring solo/duoq back
body:
remember a year ago they said we were getting pure soloQ and we didnt? they know how we will continue to play their game and wont give us back soloQ and pretend that both queues cant exist again. anyone else thinking the same?

we're now stuck with renamed dynamicQ with no alternatives

replies.body: You must be trolling.  Soloq comes out once the new season starts.  It hasn't started yet.
No, it actually comes out next week. The new season doesn't start till patch 6.24

if it dont come back ill buy you a skin... it if comes back you have to uninstall and not play any more 

deal?

Season 6 was easily the worst season in LoL history. Riot Lyte did serious damage to the ranked ladder with the introduction of DynamicQ and even more so with the removal of SoloQ. Riot admitted this and promised to bring it back.

Will they keep that promise?

With how disastrous seasons 6 turned into, I am pretty sure they will.

Consider this.

Tryndamere, president of Riot games made a blog post about the situation with DynamicQ and he mentioned that if things didn't improve with the system then he would personally step in and force the devs to bring SoloQ

I am pretty sure that's exactly what happened, because a month or two after he said that an announcement was made that SoloQ was indeed coming back for season 7.

TL:DR: Pretty sure that are under strict order from the big man himself to bring back SoloQ, so they probably will.
The promise was to make solo queue solo alongside DQ. They didn't keep their promise back then, and they aren't keeping it now.

riot are just trying to justify their inflated budgets, if they give us everything we want there will be not much to work on. how to fix their own little problem? work hard on something that overall cant be fixed so they get paid.
